document_data.name: Courtyard of Zathchos
document_data.mainbody: The '''Courtyard of Zathchos''' was a plaza in [[Suzail]], named after once of the most influential merchant families in the city â€“ [[Zathchos]].
document_data.Description: The Courtyard of Zathchos was at the center of a block between [[Stonebow Street]] to the north, to the south, the [[Promenade (Suzail)|Promenade]] to the west, and [[Torch Street]] to the east. The entrance to the plaza was a wide opening by [[Blackgorgons]], the tower home of [[wizard]] named [[Baskor]] on the Stonebow Street.
